title: Idli
instructions: Soak the rice and urad dal with fenugreek seeds for 4-6 hours.
Grind the rice and dal mixture to a smooth batter using water.
Let the batter ferment for 8-12 hours in a warm place.
Once fermented, add salt and mix the batter.
Grease idli molds and pour the batter into them.
Steam the idlis for 10-12 minutes or until they are cooked through.
Serve hot with sambar and coconut chutney.

title: Dosa
instructions: Soak the rice and urad dal with fenugreek seeds for 4-6 hours.
Grind the rice and dal mixture to a smooth batter using water.
Let the batter ferment for 8-12 hours in a warm place.
Once fermented, add salt and mix the batter.
Heat a non-stick tawa (griddle) and grease it with oil.
Pour a ladle of the batter on the tawa and spread it thin.
Cook the dosa on medium heat until crispy and golden brown, then flip and cook for a minute.
Serve hot with sambar and chutney.
